author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Adam Zivo: Don't let the Liberals fool you. The economy is doing worse than they say
text:
Summary by Ground News The latest GDP data from Statistics Canada shows that our economy shrank by 1.1 per cent in the third quarter of 2023. This data does not account for the fact that economic growth is being artificially inflated through high immigration. Once you adjust for population growth, it is clear that our standards of living are actually declining at an unprecedented rate. Share menu More
Filters 2 Articles 2 Articles All Left Center Right
National Post Lean Right High Factuality Individual: Leon Cooperman Corporation: Allianz Adam Zivo: Don't let the Liberals fool you. The economy is doing worse than they say The latest GDP data from Statistics Canada shows that our economy shrank by 1.1 per cent in the third quarter of 2023. While this is already a sobering figure, the reality is much worse than many realize, as this data does not account for the fact that economic growth is being artificially inflated through high immigration.
